title: Generate Wastewater Compliance Report
description: A plant manager needs to generate a monthly Discharge Monitoring Report (DMR) for the environmental regulator.

tasks.description: Gather all required water quality sample results for the past month from the Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS).
tasks.expected_outcome: System compiles all required data points (e.g., BOD, TSS, pH).

tasks.description: Compare the results against the plant's discharge permit limits.
tasks.expected_outcome: System confirms all results were within compliance limits.

tasks.description: Populate the official DMR form with the data and prepare it for submission.
tasks.expected_outcome: System generates the completed DMR in the required format.
